title: Do we have an epidemic? Enhancing disease surveillance using a health information exchange

title_detail.value: Do we have an epidemic? Enhancing disease surveillance using a health information exchange

summary: While disease surveillance has shifted toward greater use of electronically transmitted information to decrease the reporting burden on physicians, the challenge of getting the right information to public health officials at the right time has not been completely solved.

summary_detail.value: While disease surveillance has shifted toward greater use of electronically transmitted information to decrease the reporting burden on physicians, the challenge of getting the right information to public health officials at the right time has not been completely solved.
